name: Yuggler
description: Most can only dream of being sound of mind, body, and soul as the Yuggler. The serene yogi juggles metallic orbs to create distinct dings that soothe the troubled minds in its own proprietary form of deep Med-Ding-Tation. This ritual fortifies pupils with an unshakable fortitude, undeterred by any mishap, meltdown, or misadventure!
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 9 hr, Enhanced Time: 6 hr 45 min
